# parentFromJointTransform

**Instance Property**

The transform from the joint to its parent joint’s coordinate system.

## Declaration

```swift
var parentFromJointTransform: simd_float4x4 { get }
```

## Discussion

The root joint’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/HandSkeleton/Joint/parentFromJointTransform] is an identity matrix.

## Tracking the position of hand joints

- **anchorFromJointTransform**: The position and orientation of this joint relative to the base joint of the skeleton.
- **isTracked**: A Boolean value that indicates whether ARKit tracks a hand joint.
